document.full_text: the united states is making potassium iodide available to u.s. personnel and their dependents living in tokyo and other parts of japan, as a precaution against radiation exposure, the state department said in a travel warning on monday.
document.title: u.s. makes potassium iodide available in japan
lines_and_colors: the united states is making potassium iodide available to u.s. personnel and their dependents living in tokyo and other parts of japan, as a precaution against radiation exposure, the state department said in a travel warning on monday.
